sentences: Vabandage, ma ei saanud kohale õigeaegselt.
Ma palun vabandage eelmise päeva eest.
context: The Estonian word 'vabandage' is the formal plural imperative form of the verb 'vabandama', which means to apologize, excuse oneself, or ask for forgiveness. It is used when addressing multiple people formally or in polite speech to express regret for something that has happened.
